## ProximityCardAuth class

Proximity card authentication API. Proximity cards support both authentication and identification.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ProximityCardAuth extends Authenticator 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [authenticate(identity, cardData)](./authentication.proximitycardauth.authenticate.md) |  | Authenticates the user using a proximimty card. |
|  [identify(cardData)](./authentication.proximitycardauth.identify.md) |  | Identifies the user with a proximity card. |
